description:
A representation of the constituent items of any given order. Can be used to
represent [SKUs](https://stripe.com/docs/api#skus), shipping costs, or taxes owed on the order.

Related guide: [Orders](https://stripe.com/docs/orders/guide).

amount.description: A positive integer in the smallest currency unit (that is, 100 cents for $1.00, or 1 for Â¥1, Japanese Yen being a zero-decimal currency) representing the total amount for the line item.

currency.description: Three-letter [ISO currency code](https://www.iso.org/iso-4217-currency-codes.html), in lowercase. Must be a [supported currency](https://stripe.com/docs/currencies).

description.description: Description of the line item, meant to be displayable to the user (e.g., `"Express shipping"`).

object.description: String representing the object's type. Objects of the same type share the same value.

parent.description: The ID of the associated object for this line item. Expandable if not null (e.g., expandable to a SKU).

quantity.description: A positive integer representing the number of instances of `parent` that are included in this order item. Applicable/present only if `type` is `sku`.

type.description: The type of line item. One of `sku`, `tax`, `shipping`, or `discount`.

title: OrderItem
